name: Serpent (itch)
description:
Play as a snake collecting marbles! 

A game I made as part of my education on game design. 

Collect all of the marbles to move onto the next level. There are 3 levels in total. Collecting a marble will give you a shield, up to a max of 3 shields. The serpent will bounce off of walls twice after fired, consuming a shield when it bounces. It's Game Over if the serpent tries to bounce without a shield. 

Art assets are made by me. Music is from Kingdom Hearts, and sound effects are by Nintendo. 

Controls: 
Mouse: Aim
Left Click: Fire Serpent
